info.name: 301's Fire Shader - Remix 1
info.description:
A remix of 301's deleted fire shader, taken from here:

https://www.shadertoy.com/view/XsXXRN

Gotten it to nicely billow and smoke by using some subtractive passes.  But why can't I get a white highlight in the center of the flame no matter what?
